changeSet.author: Alex
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE types( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

changeSet.author: Andrei
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM types; INSERT INTO types (name) VALUES ('Biserica'), ('Cale de Transport'), ('Locuinta'), ('Cascada'), ('Cetate'), ('Edificiu Turistic'), ('Industrial'), ('Institutie de Invatamant'), ('Institutie Publica'), ('Lac'), ('Manastire'), ('Monument'), ('Mosie'), ('Muzeu'), ('Padure'), ('Palat'), ('Peisaj Antropic'), ('Peisaj Natural'), ('Pestera'), ('Poiana'), ('Rau'), ('Relief Montan'), ('Stanca'), ('Statie de Calatorie'), ('Turn'), ('Vale'), ('Varf Montan'), ('Zona de Agrement');

changeSet.author: Andrei
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE types_2 ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, type_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES types(id) )

changeSet.author: Andrei
changeSet.sql:
DELETE FROM types_2;
INSERT INTO types_2 (name, type_id) VALUES -- Biserica ('Evanghelica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Reformata', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Unitariana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Greco-Catolica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Lipoveneasca', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Ortodoxa Sarba', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Moschee', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Armeana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Ortodoxa Romana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Romano-Catolica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Sinagoga', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')), ('Biserica de Lemn', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Biserica')),
-- Cale de Transport ('Rutiera', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Cale de Transport')), ('Feroviara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Cale de Transport')), ('Pietonala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Cale de Transport')),
-- Locuinta ('Casa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Locuinta')), ('Castel', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Locuinta')), ('Conac', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Locuinta')), ('Cula', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Locuinta')),
-- Edificiu Turistic ('Baie Publica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Biblioteca', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Casa de Cultura', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Cazino', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Local', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Sala de Spectacole', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')), ('Unitate Cazare', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Edificiu Turistic')),
-- Industrial ('Depozit Industrial', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Magazin', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Extractie Resurse', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Productie Consumabile', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Productie Energetica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Utilaj Industrial', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')), ('Uzina', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Industrial')),
-- Institutie de Invatamant ('Facultate', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie de Invatamant')), ('Gradinita', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie de Invatamant')), ('Liceu', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie de Invatamant')), ('Scoala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie de Invatamant')), ('Institut de Cercetare', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie de Invatamant')),
-- Institutie Publica ('Financiara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Judiciara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Militara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Medicala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Administrativa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Sociala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')), ('Servicii Publice', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Institutie Publica')),
-- Manastire ('Evanghelica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Reformata', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Unitariana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Greco-Catolica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Lipoveneasca', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Ortodoxa Sarba', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Moschee', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Ortodoxa Armeana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Ortodoxa Romana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Romano-Catolica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')), ('Sinagoga', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Manastire')),
-- Monument ('Troita', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Monument Elogios', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Arta Stradala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Statuie', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Fantana Arteziana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Cimitir', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')), ('Mausoleu', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Monument')),
-- Mosie ('Curte Domneasca', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Mosie')), ('Domeniu Boieresc', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Mosie')),
-- Muzeu ('Casa Memoriala', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Expozitie', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Muzeu de Arta', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Muzeu de Etnografie', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Muzeu de Istorie', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Muzeu de Stiinte Naturale', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Muzeu Tehnic', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')), ('Observator Astronomic', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Muzeu')),
-- Peisaj Natural ('Activitate Vulcanica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')), ('Relief de Coasta', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')), ('Movila', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')), ('Insula', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')), ('Mlastina', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')), ('Varf de Deal', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Peisaj Natural')),
-- Pestera ('Pestera cu Apa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Pestera')),
-- Rau ('Izvor', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Rau')),
-- Relief Montan ('Culme Muntoasa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Relief Montan')), ('Sa Montana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Relief Montan')), ('Trecatoare Montana', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Relief Montan')),
-- Stanca ('Fereastra', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Stanca')),
-- Statie de Calatorie ('Aeroport', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Statie de Calatorie')), ('Autogara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Statie de Calatorie')), ('Gara Feroviara', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Statie de Calatorie')), ('Port', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Statie de Calatorie')), ('Statie de Metrou', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Statie de Calatorie')),
-- Turn ('Far', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Turn')), ('Foisor de Foc', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Turn')), ('Turn de Apa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Turn')), ('Turn de Cetate', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Turn')), ('Turn Industrial', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Turn')),
-- Vale ('Chei', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Vale')), ('Defileu', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Vale')), ('Rapa', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Vale')),
-- Varf Montan ('Cel Mai Inalt Varf', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Varf Montan')),
-- Zona de Agrement ('Arena Sportiva', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement')), ('Extrem Geografic', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement')), ('Gradina Botanica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement')), ('Gradina Zoologica', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement')), ('Parc', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement')), ('Salina', (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name = 'Zona de Agrement'));
